  • havoc.lib.log_structs

Source code for havoc.lib.log_structs

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

import datetime



[docs]def struct_message(m_type, job_id, message):
    """
    Format message into a dict, and append to job_messages list to send to
    JobLogger queue.
    @param job_id: int job_id
    @type: int
    @param message: str message to log
    @type: str
    @return: None
    """
    message = {
        'time': datetime.datetime.now(),
        'type': m_type,
        'job_id': job_id,
        'message': message
    }
    return message



[docs]def result_message(category, job_id, asset_id, hostname, test_id, test_name,
        result_key, result_value):
    """
    Format message into a dict, and append to job_messages list to send to
    JobLogger queue.
    @param job_id: ID of this job
    @type: int
    @param test_id: ID of current test
    @type: int
    @param test_name: name of current test
    @type: str
    @param result_key: descriptor of result
    @type: str
    @param result_value: value of result
    @type: str
    @return: message struct with key / value pairs
    """
    message = {
        'job_id': job_id,
        'asset_id': asset_id,
        'hostname': hostname,
        'test_id': test_id,
        'test_name': test_name,
        'result_key': result_key,
        'result_value': result_value,
        'category': category
    }
    return message
